Thanks for the upload and, moreso, thanks for the info about the cut. I wasn't aware that the DVD had been cut.

I have a bootleg VHS circa 1980s somewhere and the scene you described is certainly familiar although I must say I didn't find its absence conspicuous when I had re-watched the film on DVD.

Anyone know where to get an uncut copy of Piccole Labbra/ Little Lips?

I have an R2 DVD of the film but it quite brutally cut and the transfer is also quite poor.

I'd really like to see that film restored!
